hero.title: Kaabo si ComSpace
hero.subtitle: Ile itaja rẹ fun gbogbo nkan

help.price: Ṣeto owo ọja ni owo ti a yan. Ronu nipa owo-ori ati gbigbe nigba siseto owo.
help.description: Kọ apejuwe kedere ti o ṣe afihan awọn ẹya pataki, awọn ohun elo, ati awọn ilana itọju.
help.sku: Ẹya idanimọ iṣura — idanimọ alailẹgbẹ ti o lo lati tọpinpin iṣura.
help.category: Yan ẹka ti o dara julọ fun ọja yii ki awọn alabara le rii ni rọọrun.
help.inventory: Iye awọn nkan to wa fun tita. Ṣeto si 0 lati samisi bi aini ọja.
help.images: Po awọn aworan didara-giga (a gba 800x800px). Awọn igun lọpọlọpọ ṣe iranlọwọ fun iyipada.

auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Ṣe o ti ni akọọlẹ tẹlẹ?

help.email: Enter a valid email address. We'll use this to send order confirmations and password resets.
help.password: Choose a strong password (minimum 8 characters). Use letters, numbers and symbols to keep your account secure.
help.confirmPassword: Repeat your password exactly. This ensures you didn't mistype your password when registering.
help.firstName: Your given name. This appears on customer receipts and emails.
help.lastName: Your family name. Helps personalize communications and invoices.
help.phone: A phone number we can use for delivery updates and account verification.
help.forgotPassword: If you forget your password, we'll send a reset link to your registered email address.

help.branding: Upload your logo and choose colors to reflect your brand across the storefront and emails.
help.domain: Use a custom domain (recommended) or a platform subdomain. For custom domains, update your DNS records.
help.payment: Connect your Stripe account to receive payments directly. Ensure your business details match Stripe verification.
help.features: Toggle features like delivery, pickup, reviews and social login based on your store needs.
help.contactEmail: This contact information appears on the store's contact page and in customer emails.
